title: Launch of RIQ Global Reinsurance Platform
description: IHC, in partnership with BlackRock and Lunate, officially launched RIQ (Reinsurance Intelligence Quotient), an AI-native global reinsurance platform headquartered in Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM). The platform focuses on leveraging AI for risk selection, cost management, and customer service, targeting Property and Casualty (P&C), Life, and specialized segments with an initial focus on high-growth markets. The launch included the formation of a distinguished Board of Directors chaired by Dr. Sultan Ahmed Al Jaber and led by CEO Mark Wilson, supported by over $1 billion in initial equity and aiming for over $10 billion in liabilities.
source_name: IHC Reveals “RIQ” as Official Name of the New Global Reinsurance Platform  Based in Abu Dhabi

opportunities.title: Integration of AI-driven Data Providers for Risk Assessment
opportunities.description: Data analytics and risk modeling companies specializing in property, casualty, or life insurance can integrate their solutions into the RIQ platform to enhance AI-driven risk selection and pricing. As RIQ aims to use advanced AI for risk management, real-time and innovative data feeds (e.g., climate risk, health telemetry, IoT sensor data) could improve underwriting accuracy and outcomes.
roadmap_steps: Identify relevant AI or data products that can augment RIQ's risk models
Develop a pitch outlining mutual benefits and data integration advantages
Establish technical compatibility with the RIQ platform API or data standards
Contact the RIQ business development or partnerships team
Negotiate pilot testing terms and initiate technical integration

opportunities.title: Enterprise Cloud Infrastructure Partnerships
opportunities.description: Cloud services or cybersecurity companies can offer specialized hosting, data management, or security solutions optimized for financial services to support RIQ’s global scale, high-performance computing needs, and compliance obligations. RIQ's reliance on AI and large-scale data processing makes robust infrastructure partnerships vital.
roadmap_steps: Analyze RIQ’s technical requirements for cloud-hosted AI workloads
Develop a tailored value proposition regarding scalability and compliance
Engage technical and sales teams to craft migration or integration scenarios
Reach out to RIQ’s infrastructure procurement department
Coordinate proof-of-concept or pilot integrations

opportunities.title: Specialized Insurance Brokerage Collaborations
opportunities.description: Regional or specialized insurance brokerages, particularly in high-growth markets, can partner with RIQ to distribute new reinsurance products or tap into its AI-driven underwriting for their client bases, offering unique coverage and improved pricing.
roadmap_steps: Review RIQ’s product offering and identify white-space in local/regional markets
Prepare a business case for joint distribution or co-branded offerings
Connect with RIQ’s channel or business development managers
Negotiate partnership framework and operational workflows
Establish regulatory and compliance alignment

opportunities.title: Third-party RegTech Compliance Solutions Integration
opportunities.description: Regulatory technology firms can offer compliance monitoring and reporting tools tailored for RIQ’s operations in the Abu Dhabi Global Market and other target jurisdictions. Integration ensures automated compliance with evolving international regulatory standards and reporting obligations.
roadmap_steps: Research regulatory and compliance needs in RIQ’s operational regions
Develop a demo showcasing RegTech integration for reinsurance platforms
Initiate contact with RIQ’s compliance and legal departments
Align on integration scope, data handling, and privacy requirements
Pilot and monitor implementation for regulatory audits

opportunities.title: Customer Experience and AI Chatbot Enhancement Partners
opportunities.description: AI-powered customer service and chatbot technology companies can partner with RIQ to enhance customer interaction, claims automation, and onboarding, leveraging RIQ’s AI-native infrastructure for superior service in global insurance markets.
roadmap_steps: Survey RIQ’s digital touchpoints and customer service pain points
Develop AI customer experience prototypes tailored to reinsurance use cases
Present capabilities to RIQ’s technology leadership
Conduct proof-of-concept deployments on select customer journeys
Refine integration based on customer feedback and operational metrics
